src_original: tathā hyasya [suvi]niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
kutaḥ punarasya ātma[sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati /
evaṃkāmaśca bhavati /  mayaivaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvārthā upasaṃhartavyā iti /
maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati /  ato 'sya durgatibhayaṃ na bhavati /
ātmanaśca sarvaloke na paśyatyāśayena kañcitsamasamam /  kutaḥ punaruttarataramiti /
